text: Veronica A. Cartwright (born April 20, 1949) is an English born American actress who has worked mainly in American television series and movies. She played Nancy in the 1978 version of Invasion of the Body Snatchers, Betty Grissom in The Right Stuff and Elaine Swit in My Man Adam. ==References== Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:1949 births Category:Living people
title: Veronica Cartwright
